products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: Q | SUBSTATION BUILDING > Q1 | HIGH VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with wet pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic type. 80 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: trim assembly: wet pilot, included: strainer, included: drain valve, included: pressure gauge, included: pressure switch, included: flame proof 3/2 way solenoid valve, included: air filter regulator, included: manual release unit, type: electro-pneumatic

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: Q | SUBSTATION BUILDING > Q1 | HIGH VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing & commissioning of CS Gate Valve as per API 600, class 150 with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts. 80 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: cs(carbon steel), standard: API 600, class: 150, included: matching flanges, included: nuts & bolts

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: Q | SUBSTATION BUILDING > Q1 | HIGH VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply,installation and commissioning of UL/FM approved Quartzoid Bulb Detector for K factor-80. Temp rating 68 deg C
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: certification: UL(underwriters laboratories), certification: FM, k factor: 80, temperature rating: 68 deg C

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: Q | SUBSTATION BUILDING > Q1 | HIGH VELOCITY WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications 80 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: heavy class, standard: IS 1239(indian standard 1239), fittings: threaded or grooved, included: elbow, included: tee, included: reducer, included: welding flanges, included: clamps, included: ms(mild steel) brackets / hangers, included: steel supports, included: zinc chromate primer, included: 2 coats red enamel paint, as per: fire authorities requirement, for: above ground pipes
